IncidentDef.letterText:
We've received an urgent message from a nearby town.

There has been a zombie outbreak in several of the neighboring towns! According to experts the virus is now airborne and we could already be infected!

If this is true, all human corpses could soon start reanimating. Maybe we should start burning them.
There have been scattered reports of a zombie outbreak in nearby towns. We better prepare ourselves because they could be coming here next.
